about_the_game:
"Score the Fear" is a 3D adventure game in which you explore rooms and find hidden ghosts.

The little ghost that appeared before your eyes seems to want to become a proper evil spirit.

He'll scare you in a variety of ways, so rate him on whether he was scary or not.

The story will last up to three days and unfold depending on the results of the scoring.

Can you make this child's wish come true?

Ghost boy (Yu-kun) is hiding in various places in the room to scare you. Find Yu-kun and let him scare you.

Once you've found him five times, it's time to rate him.

Give him a rating out of 3 stars, from 1 to 3.

This marks the end of the day.

On the second day, his scare skills have improved a bit.

You can grade him again.

The outcome of the third day will depend on the results of the grading on the first and second days.

See how Yu-kun has grown.

【Number of endings】

5 types　+α

【Play time】

1 play: 5-15 minutes

Total play: about 60 minutes

【About streaming and video posting】

You are welcome.

Regardless of whether you are a company or an individual, you are free to stream or post live playthrough videos without needing to obtain permission.

It is okay to earn revenue by streaming and posting videos of this game.

However, please include the title of this game in the title of your stream/video (just "Score the Fear " is fine) and the URL of this store page in the description.

(※The EX version, which is unlocked after all EDs have been collected, cannot be posted online, but it is okay to hide the relevant part of the screen when streaming or posting the video.)
